info.title: Clone of The Internet Movie Database API
info.description: Creating a clone of the API of the Internet Movie Database

tags.name: users
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the account of an user.

tags.name: movies
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the movies.

tags.name: tv-series
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the tv series.

tags.name: tv-episodes
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the tv episodes of tv series.

tags.name: crew-members
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the crew members of movies and tv series.

tags.name: genres
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the genres of movies, tv series and tv episodes.

tags.name: reviews
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the reviews written by users about movies, tv series and tv episodes.

tags.name: roles
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the roles that crew members had in movies, tv series and tv episodes.

tags.name: tv-series-genres
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the middle table between the tv series table and the genres table.

tags.name: tv-episodes-genres
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the middle table between the tv episodes table and the genres table.

tags.name: movies-genres
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the middle table between the movies table and the genres table.

tags.name: crew-members-movies
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the middle table between the crew members table and the movies table.

tags.name: crew-members-tv-series
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the middle table between the crew members table and the tv series table.

tags.name: crew-members-tv-episodes
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the middle table between the crew members table and the tv episodes table.

tags.name: crew-members-roles
tags.description: This endpoint manage all the information of the middle table between the crew members table and the roles table.

id.description: The id of a resource.
The auto-generated id of user's account.

username.description: The username of the user's account.

password.description: The hashed password of the user's account.

image.description: The url of the profile image of the user's account.

createdAt.description: Date of creation of the account.

updatedAt.description: Date that the account was updated.

id.description: The auto-generated id of a review.

description.description: The main content of the review.
description.example: This was an incredible movie, the acting was out of this world, the directing nad cinematography was also of the charts!

rating.description: The star rating in a scale from 1 to 5 that the user gave to the movie or tv series or tv episode which the review is about.

number_upvotes.description: The number of 'helpful' votes that the review has.

number_downvotes.description: The number of 'unhelpful' votes that the review has.

users_id.description: The id of the user that wrote this review.

movies_id.description: The id of the movie about which the review is about.

tv_series_id.description: The id of the tv series about which the review is about.

tv_episodes_id.description: The id of the tv episode about which the review is about.

createdAt.description: Date of creation of the review.

updatedAt.description: Date that the review was updated.

id.description: The auto-generated id of a movie.

rating.description: The star rating in a scale from 1 to 5 of a movie.

popularity.description: The current rank of popularity of the movie.

year.description: The year the movie was made.

description.description: A summary of the movie's plot.
description.example: After the events of Breaking Bad, Jessie Pinkman finds himself on the run and trying to start a new life.
